heading: NWC Association SRMIST 22-23 Recruitments
para: NWC aims to develop virtuous students with a diverse approach that  would showcase their holistic development. The department' research focuses on developing new and creative ideas that manifest students’ zeal to achieve higher in life. Using technical methodologies, the organization concentrates on providing insights into the future scope of development or improving the pre-existing ones.
afterPara: We’re currently recruiting for the following domains :
eligibility: Students from 1st -2nd years are eligible to apply for the same.
